description: Python SDK features: keys, crypto, connections, pubsub, CRDT, capabilities, PoW, invoices

userStories.title: Python SDK: keypair generation
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want to generate Ed25519 keypairs.
acceptanceCriteria: SDK exposes generate_keypair() returning pubkey and secret key bytes
Keys are generated using OS randomness
userStories.notes: Added generate_keypair in implementations/python-sdk/aether/crypto.py with tests in implementations/python-sdk/tests/test_crypto.py.

userStories.title: Python SDK: key import/export
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want to import/export keys in hex and bech32.
acceptanceCriteria: SDK imports keys from hex and bech32 strings
SDK exports keys to hex and bech32 strings
userStories.notes: Added hex and bech32 key import/export helpers in implementations/python-sdk/aether/keys.py with tests in implementations/python-sdk/tests/test_crypto.py.

userStories.title: Python SDK: event_id computation
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want to compute event_id per spec.
acceptanceCriteria: SDK computes Blake3 hash over canonical serialized event fields
userStories.notes: Added compute_event_id and event_id_from_dict in implementations/python-sdk/aether/crypto.py with tests in implementations/python-sdk/tests/test_crypto.py.

userStories.title: Python SDK: event signing and verify
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want to sign and verify events.
userStories.notes: Added sign/verify helpers in implementations/python-sdk/aether/crypto.py with tests in implementations/python-sdk/tests/test_crypto.py.

userStories.title: Python SDK: connection pooling
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want connection pooling across relays.
acceptanceCriteria: SDK opens and maintains 3-5 relay connections

userStories.title: Python SDK: failover and backoff
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want automatic failover and exponential backoff.
acceptanceCriteria: Disconnected relay triggers failover to another relay

userStories.title: Python SDK: 0-RTT resumption
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want session resumption when transport supports it.
acceptanceCriteria: SDK uses 0-RTT resumption on QUIC when available
userStories.notes: Implemented placeholder 0-RTT session ticket header in implementations/python-sdk/aether/client.py.

userStories.title: Python SDK: publish API
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want to publish events to relays.
acceptanceCriteria: publish() sends event to all connected relays
userStories.notes: Implemented publish API in implementations/python-sdk/aether/client.py returning per-relay status.

userStories.title: Python SDK: subscribe API with filters
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want to subscribe with filters.
acceptanceCriteria: subscribe() accepts kind, pubkey prefix, tags, since, until filters
userStories.notes: Implemented subscribe/unsubscribe API with filters in implementations/python-sdk/aether/client.py and aether/filters.py.

userStories.title: Python SDK: CRDT G-Counter
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want a G-Counter helper.
userStories.notes: CRDT G-Counter already implemented in implementations/python-sdk/aether/crdt/__init__.py with tests in implementations/python-sdk/tests/test_crdt.py.

userStories.title: Python SDK: CRDT PN-Counter
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want a PN-Counter helper.
acceptanceCriteria: PN-Counter supports increment, decrement, and merge
userStories.notes: CRDT PN-Counter already implemented in implementations/python-sdk/aether/crdt/__init__.py with tests in implementations/python-sdk/tests/test_crdt.py.

userStories.title: Python SDK: CRDT LWW-Register
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want an LWW-Register helper.
acceptanceCriteria: Merge resolves by timestamp and tie-breaker
userStories.notes: CRDT LWW-Register already implemented in implementations/python-sdk/aether/crdt/__init__.py with tests in implementations/python-sdk/tests/test_crdt.py.

userStories.title: Python SDK: CRDT OR-Set
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want an OR-Set helper.
acceptanceCriteria: OR-Set supports add, remove, and merge
userStories.notes: CRDT OR-Set already implemented in implementations/python-sdk/aether/crdt/__init__.py with tests in implementations/python-sdk/tests/test_crdt.py.

userStories.title: Python SDK: capability tokens
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want to create and verify capability chains.
userStories.notes: Added capability token helpers in implementations/python-sdk/aether/capabilities.py with tests in implementations/python-sdk/tests/test_capabilities.py.

userStories.title: Python SDK: PoW helper
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want a helper to compute PoW nonces.
acceptanceCriteria: SDK exposes helper to compute PoW nonce for a target difficulty
userStories.notes: Added PoW helper in implementations/python-sdk/aether/pow.py with tests in implementations/python-sdk/tests/test_pow.py.

userStories.title: Python SDK: invoice attachment support
userStories.description: As a Python developer, I want to serialize and parse invoice attachments.
acceptanceCriteria: SDK can serialize invoice attachment for kind 10002
SDK can parse invoice attachment from events
